attributes.action: Infirmary Bridge Inverness, fix repairs & keep open popular access point
attributes.additional_details: Allocate funding to the repairs that are needed for the bridge
attributes.background: Find the funding to fix the repairs and keep a beautiful and iconic foot bridge over the River Ness in Inverness open, popular with locals and tourists. In difficult times people and businesses need this open for access, is vital to get across the river and is a piece of history.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
